You will be starting with no potions. Drop 3 webs on blue buff before the game starts. Clear speed with your mid using NO spiders. Run directly to mid lane, blink on the mid laner, try to kill DO not dive the tower, go directly to their red buff. Steal red, mids, and then do your own buffs.

Aggressive high damage support build that allows your teammates to do more damage, but you will die faster.
